User Stories: As an institutional user, I want to access asset discovery features programmatically via API, so I can integrate real-time asset data and screening into my own products and services.
As a retail user, I want to set up personalized alerts for new assets matching my criteria (e.g., market cap, volume, sentiment), so I never miss emerging opportunities.
As a retail user, I want to view the recommended assets based on my criteria from the Midas platform, so I never miss any emerging opportunities.

As a portfolio manager, I want to compare potential assets side-by-side on key metrics like volatility, risk, and historical performance, so that I can efficiently evaluate which assets best suit my strategy.
As a retail user, I want to view detailed information, analytics, and sentiment indicators for any discovered asset, so I can make informed decisions before adding it to my portfolio.
As an advanced trader, I want to use AI-driven recommendations to surface trending or under-the-radar assets, so I can gain a competitive edge and act on timely market signals.
As a retail user, I want to search and filter assets across multiple classes (crypto, stocks, FX, commodities), so I can easily discover new investment opportunities in one unified platform.

As a user, I want conversational AI to automatically notify me about strategies on the platform that have outperformed in similar market conditions, and present these side-by-side with my current strategy, so I can make smarter, data-driven adjustments with confidence.

As a user, I want to use conversational AI to suggest alternative strategies in Midas and compare them with my current setup, so I can easily evaluate and choose outperforming options using intuitive, AI-powered insights.

As a user, I want to use conversational AI to assist me in refining my ETH momentum strategy by adding a volatility stop and explaining the expected impact, so I can confidently enhance my strategies and understand the effects of modifications

As a user, I want to use conversational AI to help me create a strategy for the preferred assets, so I can intuitively design and understand new strategies tailored to my needs without technical barriers.
As a retail user, I want to receive upgrade prompts when I’m close to or have exhausted my credits, so I can consider moving to a higher tier for more resources.
As a retail user, I want to see my current tokens balance and usage details, so I can optimize my platform usage and upgrade if needed.
As a retail user, I want to easily upgrade, downgrade, or cancel my subscription and see the impact on my account features in real time.
As the business owner, I want to enable the users to unlock/limit features based on their subscription tier and verification status automatically
As a first-time user, I want a 7-day Premium Trial so I can experience premium features before committing.
As a new user, I want to quickly register and get instant access to Free/Pro features so I can evaluate the platform without friction.
As a retail user, I want to customize my portfolio dashboard, notification preferences, and analytics to fit my goals and workflow.
As a retail user, I want to receive personalized insights to optimize, rebalancing, and risk mitigation for my portfolio.
As a retail user, I want a centralized dashboard that shows my total portfolio value, asset breakdown, and performance metrics in real time.
As a retail user, I want to securely connect my brokerage/exchange accounts so that I can automatically retrieve, view, and manage my actual portfolio holdings in one place.

As a retail user, I want to receive recommendations that combine my preferences, my interaction history, strategy performance, and what’s trending on the platform, so I always get the most relevant and timely suggestions.

As a user, I want to filter and receive recommendations based on specific performance criteria (e.g., win rate above 70%, drawdown below 10%), so I can focus on high-quality, risk-controlled strategies.

As a user, I want the AI to automatically search the community’s historical backtest records and recommend strategies that share similar structural features or trading logic I created and backtest, which also demonstrate superior performance.
As a retail user, I want to benefit from the experience and preferences of other users with similar interests, so I can find popular and effective strategies that people like me are using.

As a retail user, I want to discover new strategies that share similar attributes (such as asset type, tags, timeframe) to those I have already explored, so I can efficiently find relevant options that fit my interests or trading style.

As a strategy developer, I want the platform to display my strategy’s ranking and user engagement metrics (such as number of favorites, backtests, and applications) on the trending leaderboard, so I can understand which of my strategies are gaining traction, optimize accordingly, and increase visibility and user adoption.

As a new user, I want to be greeted with AI-curated recommendations of the week’s or month’s hottest strategies and most discussed community topics as soon as I join the platform, so I can quickly onboard, reduce choice anxiety, and feel engaged from the start.

As a platform operator or product manager, I want to track user interactions with various strategies (favorites, backtests, applications), so that the system can automatically generate and push “recently trending strategies” leaderboards, and provide API endpoints for external partners to enhance platform stickiness, boost user engagement and conversion, and enable B2B data integration.

As an investor, I want to instantly see a list of trending or most popular strategies on the platform’s main page or strategy section, so that I can quickly identify current market favorites and discover recent high-performing opportunities across multiple asset classes (crypto, stocks, FX, commodities) to boost my decision-making efficiency and confidence.

As a retail user, I want to share my favorite or high-performing investment strategies directly to my social media channels (such as Telegram, YouTube, X/Twitter, or WhatsApp), so that I can showcase my insights, discuss with my network, or invite others to follow and apply these strategies.

As the owner, I want to have the AI recommended strategies (with similar logic, asset class, performance or risk profile), so that we can cross-sell the users when they are viewing particular strategy.

As a user, I want an AI agent to assist me by recommending suitable strategies or assets based on my risk appetite and preferences, so that I can efficiently discover, compare, and act on optimal opportunities tailored to my needs via a conversational and intuitive interface.
Epics: Strategy Creation & Customization (https://www.notion.so/Strategy-Creation-Customization-2d91191b72fc80959eaffcb2491fa02c?pvs=21), Personalized Investment Companion (https://www.notion.so/Personalized-Investment-Companion-2f61191b72fc806b846eddfdb5fa8a98?pvs=21)

User Stories: As a user, I want to save a strategy after I have customized its parameters or logic using the visual builder or by cloning a predefined model, so that I can keep my personalized version for future backtesting, refinement, or live application.

As a user, I want to bookmark strategies from the predefined strategies gallery or strategy detail page,
so that I can easily access and revisit my favorite or high-potential strategies for review, comparison, or further action at a later time.
As a user, I want to apply strategies to my portfolio directly from their overview, so I can quickly adapt to market changes.
As a user, I want to add assets to my watchlist directly from their overview, so I never lose track of potential opportunities.
As a user, I want to review and clone strategy ideas for specific assets, so I can observe my watchlist or enhance my portfolio with proven models.
As a user, I want to add new assets to my portfolio using an asset picker or by importing a CSV, so I can quickly adapt to market changes.
As a user, I want to receive strategy and asset recommendations based on my risk profile, so I can discover new opportunities aligned to my preferences.
As a user, I want to run scenario analyses (e.g., “What if I reallocate to more defensive assets?”), so I can plan for different market outcomes.
As a user, I want to receive a risk assessment of my current portfolio, so I understand exposure, correlations, and potential vulnerabilities.
As a user, I want to see consolidated performance metrics (PnL, drawdown, Sharpe ratio, etc.) for my entire portfolio as well as individual assets, so I can track my progress and optimize holdings.
As a user, I want to run backtests on assets or strategies from my watchlist, so I can validate ideas before trade execution.
As a user, I want to view a single asset’s overview (performance, risk, news), so I can make informed decisions before acting.
As a user, I want to create and manage multiple watchlists, so I can easily monitor assets and strategies that interest me.
As a user, I want to receive backtest results and live signals via my preferred messaging app, so I never miss important updates.
As a user, I want to get personalized strategy recommendations, so I can discover new opportunities aligned to my profile.
As a user, I want to backtest strategies and view comprehensive results, so I can make data-driven deployment decisions.
As a user, I want to visually build or clone strategies, so I can create custom approaches without coding.
As a user, I want the platform to display the most relevant predefined strategies itself that match my risk appetize, so I can quickly pick ones that I prefer.
As a user, I want to browse and filter predefined strategies so I can quickly find ones that match my risk preference.
As a user, I want to get timely notifications about strategy recommendations with its backtest results or relevant market events, so I never miss actionable opportunities.
As a user, I want to receive notifications about the performance summaries once a week, so I am always aware of the portfolio performance.
As a user, I want to customize which types of email notifications I receive (e.g., opt in/out of marketing or non-critical alerts), so the communication is relevant to me.
As an Org Admin / B2C user, I want to receive notifications about important account actions (e.g., subscription status changes), so I am always aware of my account standing.
As a user, I want to receive an email after register an account, so I know my onboarding is successful and can access the platform.
Relevant PRD: Email Notification System (https://www.notion.so/Email-Notification-System-2a41191b72fc805f9858d16aafc3df34?pvs=21), User Management System (https://www.notion.so/User-Management-System-2a31191b72fc8008bfa1f93fe5d5cc3c?pvs=21)

User Stories: As an Org Admin, I want to be notified by email when team members accounts are being activated, deactivated, or change roles, so I can maintain oversight of organization access.

As a retail user, I want to receive clear, real-time feedback on any errors or missing information during the registration process, so that I can quickly correct my input and complete my account creation without confusion or frustration.

As a retail user, I want my account to be secure, including email verification, account lockout after repeated failed logins, and a secure password reset process, so I can trust the platform with my sensitive information.
Relevant PRD: Email Notification System (https://www.notion.so/Email-Notification-System-2a41191b72fc805f9858d16aafc3df34?pvs=21), User Management System (https://www.notion.so/User-Management-System-2a31191b72fc8008bfa1f93fe5d5cc3c?pvs=21)

User Stories: As a retail user, I want to choose between signing up with email/password or Google OAuth, so I have flexibility and convenience in how I access MIDAS.
As a compliance officer, I want all user activities to be logged and auditable, so we can meet institutional and regulatory obligations.
As a B2B user, I want to receive a secure activation link with clear instructions, so I can easily activate my account and start using the platform with the correct permissions.
Relevant PRD: User Management System (https://www.notion.so/User-Management-System-2a31191b72fc8008bfa1f93fe5d5cc3c?pvs=21), Email Notification System (https://www.notion.so/Email-Notification-System-2a41191b72fc805f9858d16aafc3df34?pvs=21)

Story Title: Role & Permission Assignment for Org Members
User Stories: As an admin (Midas/Org), I want to assign specific roles and permissions to members, so we maintain compliance and operational efficiency.
As an admin (Midas/Org), I want to invite, activate, and manage users within my organization, so I can control who has access to sensitive data and trading tools.
As a retail user, I want to self-register via web or mobile with minimal steps, so I can quickly access the platform and start exploring investment opportunities.
As a Midas admin, I want to create new organizations and assign Org Admins via the admin portal, so B2B clients can be onboarded
